SMS_NUMBERS_OR_COMMAS_REQUIRED: Only valid phone numbers separated by commas can be used in this field
SMS_POSITIVE_NUMBERS_REQUIRED: Only positive numbers can be used
SMS_CUSTOM_PARAMS_FORMAT: Map custom parameters in key:value format. Use new line as a separator.
SMS_GENERIC_INVALID_FORM: Form is invalid. Check fields and send it again.
SMS_CONFIG_FORM_NAME_IS_NOT_UNIQUE: Each config must have their unique name
SMS_SEND_SMS_SENDING_SUCCESS: The message was sent to the provided recipient(s).
SMS_SEND_SMS_SENDING_FAILURE: The message could not be sent to the provided recipient(s).
SMS_ADD_RECIPIENT_TOOLTIP: Separate multiple phone numbers with comma.
SMS_ADD_CUSTOM_PARAMETERS_TOOLTIP: Map custom parameters in key:value format. Use new line as a separator.
SMS_IMPORT_CONFIG_TEMPLATES_MODAL_DESCRI: You can upload a file containing additional configuration templates for different providers. Refer to the documentation for more information on writing custom configuration templates for different provides.
